(CNN) When Flavio Ramos was wheeled into the hospital room, he was gasping for air and slipping in and out of consciousness. So it was his son, Arturo, who first noticed the bodies.
Two corpses laid unattended on the tile floor. By the next morning, the body… [+9834 chars]

articles.title: Olanzapine drug can help manage nausea and vomiting in patients with advanced cancer - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: Olanzapine, a generic drug used to treat nervous, emotional and mental conditions, also may help patients with advanced cancer successfully manage nausea and vomiting unrelated to chemotherapy.
